text: Amazing Bakso in Singapore!! Love the spicy version soooooooooo much 😋😋 The clear soup one was great too!!!! We talked about it all of today 🤣 Do expect us to keep coming back ❤️❤️
Third time ordering and it is SO good! portion is a lot so i would always share with my family. everything is a hit not a single thing on their menu is a miss. Definitely recommended👍🏼👍🏼

Friendly and warm service by lady boss herself! While they normally do takeaways, our party of 2 were offered a lovely table setting. Soup was a little salty for my taste but the bakso and meat was generous and the sambal was shiok spicy and fresh. Thank u for your hospitality!:)
Food was very delicious,   Singapore best bakso, very friendly owner and the taste very nice  as well. Highly recommended
The best bakso in Singapore definitely. They put the meat generously. The broth is so good. Will come back!
